archimate:Capability.name: Information Risk Assessment
archimate:Capability.documentation:
This capability involves conducting regular information risk assessments for target environments, such as critical business areas, processes, applications (including those in development), and supporting technical infrastructure. It emphasizes a rigorous and consistent approach, utilizing a systematic and structured methodology.
Key activities in this capability include scoping, business impact assessment, threat profiling, vulnerability assessment, risk evaluation, and risk treatment. This methodology ensures comprehensive coverage and effective management of information risks.
